applicant--address-description: We’ll send any important information about this form to this address.
applicant--address-label--military: Address is on a U.S. military base outside of the United States.
applicant--address-change-label: Has the beneficiary’s mailing address changed since their last CHAMPVA form submission?
applicant--address-change-hint: Any updates you make here will only apply to your CHAMPVA benefits. We won’t update your address in your VA.gov profile.
applicant--age-label: Is the beneficiary 65 years old or older?
applicant--age-hint: Depending on your response, you may need to submit additional documents.
applicant--age-option--yes: Yes, the beneficiary is 65 or older
applicant--birth-sex-label: What’s the beneficiary’s sex listed at birth?
applicant--birth-sex-hint: Enter the sex that appears on the beneficiary’s birth certificate.
attachments--hint-text: Upload front and back as separate files.
health-insurance--cancel-add-description: If you cancel adding this plan, we won’t save its information. You’ll return to a screen where you can add or remove plans.
health-insurance--cancel-edit-descriptio: If you cancel editing this health insurance plan, we won’t save its information. You’ll return to a screen where you can add or remove other health insurance policies.
health-insurance--delete-item-descriptio: This will delete %s and all the information from your list of other health insurance plans.
health-insurance--delete-noun-descriptio: This will delete this %s and all the information from your list of other health insurance plans.
health-insurance--yes-no-title: Does the beneficiary need to add or update other health insurance information?
health-insurance--yes-no-more-title: Do you have any other health insurance to report?
health-insurance--yes-no-hint: If so, you must report this information for us to process your application.
health-insurance--addtl-comments-label: Do you have any additional comments about the beneficiary’s health insurance?
health-insurance--addtl-comments-hint: Use this space to let us know about any upcoming changes in the insurance coverage you added.
health-insurance--card-upload-descriptio: You’ll need to submit a copy of the front and back of this health insurance card.
health-insurance--card-upload-label--fro: Upload front of the health insurance card
health-insurance--card-upload-label--bac: Upload back of the health insurance card
health-insurance--employer-label: Is this insurance through the beneficiary’s employer?
health-insurance--medigap-label: Select the Medigap policy the beneficiary is enrolled in
health-insurance--plan-type-label: Which type of insurance plan or program is the beneficiary enrolled in?
health-insurance--plan-type-hint: This information is on the front of your health insurance card.
health-insurance--plan-type-option--medi: Medicaid or a state assistance program
health-insurance--plan-type-option--othe: Other (specialty, limited coverage, or exclusively CHAMPVA supplemental) insurance
health-insurance--prescription-label: Does the beneficiary’s health insurance cover prescriptions?
health-insurance--prescription-hint: You may find this information on the front of the health insurance card. You can also contact the phone number listed on the back of the card.
health-insurance--effective-date-hint: This information is on the insurance policy declarations page.
health-insurance--termination-date-hint: Only enter this date if the policy is inactive.
medicare--card-upload-alt-text--back: Back of a red, white, and blue Medicare card. Includes card usage instructions and the Medicare phone number and website.
medicare--carrier-hint: The insurance carrier may be listed as “Medicare Health Insurance” on the insurance card.
medicare--carrier-hint--alt: This is the name of the insurance company.
medicare--general-pharmacy-label: Does the beneficiary’s Medicare plan provide pharmacy benefits?
medicare--general-pharmacy-hint: You can find this information on the front of the Medicare card.
medicare--mbi-description: Every Medicare recipient has an 11-character Medicare Beneficiary Identifier (MBI) code. You can find this code on the front of Medicare cards or on medicare.gov accounts.
medicare--mbi-hint: You can enter an HICN if that’s what’s shown on the Medicare card.
medicare--parts-ab-card-title: Upload Medicare card for Hospital and Medical insurance
medicare--parts-ab-card-label--front: Upload front of Original Medicare card
medicare--parts-ab-card-label--back: Upload back of Original Medicare card
medicare--parts-ab-card-alt-text--front: Red, white, and blue Medicare card. It states “Medicare Health Insurance” and lists the Medicare number and coverage dates for Part A hospital and Part B medical coverage.
medicare--part-a-card-label--front: Upload front of Part A Medicare card
medicare--part-a-card-label--back: Upload back of Part A Medicare card
medicare--part-a-card-alt-text--front: Red, white, and blue Medicare card. It states “Medicare Health Insurance” and lists the Medicare number and coverage dates for Part A hospital coverage.
medicare--part-a-denial-notice-label: Does the beneficiary have a notice of disallowance, denial, or other proof of ineligibility for Medicare Part A?
medicare--part-a-denial-notice-hint: Depending on your response, you may need to submit additional documents.
medicare--part-a-effective-date-hint: You may find the effective date on the front of the Medicare card near “Coverage starts” or “Effective date.”
medicare--part-b-card-label--front: Upload front of Part B Medicare card
medicare--part-b-card-label--back: Upload back of Part B Medicare card
medicare--part-b-card-alt-text--front: Red, white, and blue Medicare card. It states “Medicare Health Insurance” and lists the Medicare number and coverage dates for Part B medical coverage.
medicare--part-b-effective-date-hint: This will be on the front of the Medicare card near “Coverage starts.”
medicare--part-c-card-description: You’ll need to submit a copy of the front and back of the beneficiary’s Medicare Part C (Medicare Advantage Plan) card.
medicare--part-c-card-label--front: Upload front of Part C Medicare card
medicare--part-c-card-label--back: Upload back of Part C Medicare card
medicare--part-c-carrier-title: %s Medicare Part C carrier and effective date
medicare--part-c-effective-date-hint: This information is on the front of the Medicare card near “Effective date” or “Issue date.” If it’s not there, it may be on the plan’s online portal or enrollment documents.
medicare--part-d-card-description: You’ll need to submit a copy of the front and back of the beneficiary’s Medicare Part D card.
medicare--part-d-card-label--front: Upload front of Part D Medicare card
medicare--part-d-card-label--back: Upload back of Part D Medicare card
medicare--part-d-effective-date-hint: This information is at the top of the card.
medicare--part-d-status-label: Does the beneficiary have Medicare Part D information to provide or update at this time?
medicare--part-d-termination-date-hint: Only enter this date if the plan is inactive.
medicare--plan-type-label: Which Medicare plan does the beneficiary have?
medicare--plan-type-option--ab: Original Medicare Parts A and B (Hospital and Medical Insurance)
medicare--plan-type-option--c: Medicare Part C, also known as Medicare Advantage (includes previous enrollment in Part A and B)
medicare--report-plan-label: Does the beneficiary have Medicare information to provide or update at this time?
signer--benefit-status-label: Does the beneficiary receive CHAMPVA benefits now?
signer--role-label: Which of these best describes you?
signer--role-option--applicant: I’m filling out this form for myself
signer--role-option--other: I’m a parent, spouse, or legal representative signing on behalf of the beneficiary
statement-of-truth--default: I confirm that the identifying information in this form is accurate and has been represented correctly.
statement-of-truth--representative: On behalf of %s, I confirm that the identifying information in this form is accurate and has been represented correctly.
validation--date-range: Termination date must be after the effective date
validation--date-value--current: Enter a valid current or past date
validation--date-value--future: Date may not be more than 1 year from today
validation--mbi-invalid: Enter a valid 11-character MBI code (without dashes)
validation--sot--applicant-signature: Enter your name exactly as it appears on your application: %s
validation--sot--checkbox: You must certify by checking the box
validation--text-characters--singular: You entered a character we can’t accept. Try removing this character
validation--text-characters--plural: You entered multiple characters we can’t accept. Try removing these characters
